## Call namespace

Namespace for enumerations and types used by [Call objects](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_class.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace Call 
```

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Event](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.event_enum.md) | Enumeration of all event strings emitted by [Call](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_class.md) objects. |
|  [Issue](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.issue_enum.md) | An enumeration of call issues that can be reported. |
|  [QualityWarning](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.qualitywarning_enum.md) | An enumeration of all call quality-warning types. |
|  [Score](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.score_enum.md) | An enumeration of all scores that could be used to rate the experience of a call or issues encountered during the call. |
|  [State](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.state_enum.md) | An enumeration of all possible [Call object](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_class.md) states. |
